nodes.text: Finn's blaster pistol was a blaster pistol used by Finn, a defected stormtrooper from the First Order who joined the Resistance in 34 ABY to aid them in their war against the First Order. The pistol was a rugged Glie-44 blaster pistol model. Finn's lifetime of combat training made him adept with a wide variety of small arms, well beyond the standard-issue weaponry of the First Order. The pistol had a power cartridge as ammunition and a reactant gas port cap in its stock. He used it as a sidearm during his Mission to Canto Bight and a mission to Kijimi.
